mapper.select: SELECT rnum, question_no, title, member_id, created_at FROM( SELECT rownum rnum, question_no, title, member_id, created_at FROM( SELECT question_no, title, member_id, created_at FROM question ORDER BY question_no DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT question_no, title, content, member_id, created_at FROM question WHERE question_no = #{question_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (title, content, member_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{member_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE question_no = #{question_no} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question WHERE question_no = #{question_no} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT question_no, content, created_at FROM answer WHERE question_no = #{question_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET question_no = #{question_no}, content = #{content} WHERE question_no = #{question_no}
